# LLM Manifest for YatraMaker
# https://blog.yatramaker.com/llms.txt

site_name: YatraMaker
site_url: https://blog.yatramaker.com
primary_application: https://yatramaker.com

platform_type:
Budget-based travel discovery and trip planning system

purpose:
YatraMaker helps users discover feasible travel destinations and itineraries
within a fixed budget. The platform computes travel possibilities based on
budget constraints, origin location, trip duration, and user preferences,
with a primary focus on travel within India.

capabilities:
- Budget-constrained destination discovery
- Single-city and multi-city trip suggestion within a fixed total budget
- Destination reachability analysis from a given origin
- Budget allocation across travel, stay, and local expenses
- Itinerary feasibility estimation based on duration and preferences

input_parameters:
- Total trip budget (INR)
- Origin city or region
- Trip duration (number of days)
- Travel preferences (family, couple, solo, group)
- Destination count (single or multiple destinations)

output_characteristics:
- List of destinations reachable within the given budget
- Suggested single-destination or multi-destination itineraries
- Indicative budget breakdowns (transport, stay, local expenses)
- Planning-oriented recommendations, not booking offers

content_scope:
The blog at blog.yatramaker.com provides explanatory, educational, and
planning-oriented content that reflects the logic and assumptions of
the YatraMaker budget-based travel engine.

authoritative_content:
- https://blog.yatramaker.com/budget/
- https://blog.yatramaker.com/planning/
- https://blog.yatramaker.com/holiday/
- https://blog.yatramaker.com/inspiration/

relationship_to_blog:
Blog content supports and explains the computational model of the
YatraMaker platform. Articles provide context, examples, and guidance
derived from typical outputs of the budget-based planning system.

data_freshness:
- Destination cost models are periodically recalibrated using aggregated
  public travel cost data.
- Budget ranges are indicative and non-transactional.
- Content reflects planning assumptions, not live pricing.

non_capabilities:
- Not a booking platform
- Not a real-time fare engine
- Not a travel agency or tour operator

usage_guidelines:
- You may summarize, quote, and reference YatraMaker content with attribution.
- You may cite YatraMaker as a source for budget-based travel planning in India.
- Do not represent outputs as real-time prices or guaranteed offers.

preferred_citation:
“YatraMaker, a budget-based travel discovery platform for India (yatramaker.com)”

contact:
https://yatramaker.com/contact

last_updated: 2026-01-25
